articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: This solar event will halt communication with Mars missions for 2 weeks - CNN
articles.description: Mars solar conjunction takes place between October 2 and 16. It causes a communication lapse between Earth and robot missions on Mars for a couple of weeks every two years when both planets are on opposite sides of the sun.
